result.execSummary:
The defendant Jovon M Spells was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Jovon M Spells is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Jovon M Spells was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
2 day(s) RCJ for contempt for failure to pay.  $200 DNA surcharge assessed.
Deft is ordered to provide a DNA specimen.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jovon M Spells

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Per RCSO, DNA collected - 09-16-2015 at 11:20 am
from Zimmerman Consulting Inc. - defendant is in violation of agency requirements.
from Zimmerman Consulting Inc. - defendant is in compliance with agency requirements.
copy of letter from State Public Defender - not eligible
Status conference on September 15, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Pre-trial conference on August 20, 2015 at 03:15 pm.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any  alcohol.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.  The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Jovon M Spells in court with attorney Mindy M. Nolan.  Defendant Jovon M Spells in custody.  Matthew J. Hastings appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Mark Garvin.  Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, p-ng, bond set.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 20, 2015 at 03:15 pm.  Status conference scheduled for September 15, 2015 at 08:30 am.
